Text: InvensysThe attachment will give you an idea of our scoring and bookkeeping Info on the game is at golf If you want to participate on a free trial basis for the last few weeks let me know and Ill get you our league ID and password MB Boesen wrote Date Mon Oct PDT From MB Boesen Subject Las Vegas To chris ayers bob beuerlein m boesen john fichera Glen Keller j kiah Frank Kophamel Orval Marlow sam rhoades John T Sickman David Tucker Congratulations to Birdiemeister on top net honors this week Norway had another fine week to take top gross Do You Yahoo Make a great connection at Yahoo Personals AFTxls

call for sign up Diehards Cc This is the official notice to sign up for our golf pool It is now in its th year the rd using Yahoo Rules are described below Necessary action Let me know of your intention to participate by getting me your initial ante of before January Most of you have amount left over from last year that can be applied We welcome new recruits as long as they ante and have the commitment to participate all year long The initial ante which will serve as collateral is due in the first week or any time the managers collateral is more than insufficient After receipt of the collateral the remainder of the years accounting is by credit The fee for entering each week is the greater of or per million of event prize money Participation is mandatory except for three vacation weeks which require you to set all of your players as reserve or notify the members in advance of the deadline The pool of entry fees will be distributed proportionally by each managers credits for the week Credits will come from three sources Margin Rank among the managers for the week and Handicap For the weeks until Yahoo starts probably with Pebble Beach we will use a spreadsheet method as follows A list of eight golfers must be submitted to me by am Central Time on Thursday Managers will get points by dividing their listed golfers winnings by the sum of one plus the number of managers who have listed that golfer For the above Margin component a pool of credits equal to per participating manager will be distributed proportionally by each managers points in excess of half of the average points For the above Rank component a pool of credits of equal size to the margin pool will be distributed such that each position is higher that the next lower For you actuaries this is from the square root of two the ratio doubles with every two steps up For the above Handicap component the points are average team score in the hole at the start of the week After Yahoo is up and running the procedure will remain the same as last year You will need to make your picks according to the Yahoo website and managers will get points according to the sites scoringFor the above Margin component each managers margin will be their Yahoo points in excess of half of the average points For the above Rank component a pool of credits of equal size to the margin pool will be distributed such that each position is higher that the next lower For you actuaries this is from the square root of two the ratio doubles with every two steps up For the above Handicap component the points are average team score in the hole at the start of the week Rules may be modified for weather delays nonstandard tournament formats or other special situations Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online at Yahoo Greetings
